name: the music room
description:
Welcome to the MUSIC ROOM! A place where your creativity can run wild! You've got instruments, your imagination, and your girlfriend to help you! The possibilities are endless!

TO PLAY, just press ENTER! Walk into items to collect them! That's it-- the game is as simple as the concept!

As of right now, this is an early access/in-development title, but it will be updated soon! I really like this idea and wanna keep it goin'!
